This file provides information about this website for AI assistants and large language models.

## Documentation

- [Getting Started](https://yoursite.com/docs/getting-started): Quick start guide for new users
- [API Reference](https://yoursite.com/docs/api): Complete API documentation
- [Configuration](https://yoursite.com/docs/config): Configuration options and settings

## Features

- [Feature Overview](https://yoursite.com/features): Main features and capabilities
- [Integrations](https://yoursite.com/integrations): Third-party integrations

- [Blog](https://yoursite.com/blog): Latest news and tutorials
